solver.search.limits

Class TimeCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • solver.search.limits.ACounter
      • solver.search.limits.TimeCounter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, ICounter, IMonitorInitialize, IMonitorOpenNode, ISearchMonitor

    public class TimeCounter
extends ACounter
implements IMonitorOpenNode
    A limit over run time. It acts as a monitor, to be up-to-date when the search loop asks for limit reaching.
    Since:
    19/04/11
    Author:
    Charles Prud'homme
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
